content: I remember back in the 80's when Overseas Magazine had a contest to come up with acronyms for AAFES. As I remember, it caused quite a stink with the head honcho's at AAFES - they did NOT like what people were saying. Anyway, in that line of thought, put down what you remember AAFES standing for. A - Almost A - Always F - Facing E - Empty S - Shelves
reply: I remember back in the 80's when Overseas Magazine had a contest to come up with acronyms for AAFES. title: AAFES Acronym's

content: Hi there. Saw the Thread with all the letters and it reminded me of something... Though not to do with the Exchange. { Please excuse the intrusion into your thread. } Many moons ago ('77-'78) at Camp Margarita - 5th Marine Regimental Chow Hall - The chow was, well, ... Let's say that most of us preferred to eat C-rats rather than go to that place, so in an act of disgust and boredom, ... I got several pieces of white poster paper, scotch tape, and some marking pens from the PX and made a sign using big letters with smaller ones to help define the meaning. Then I taped it to the building next to the front hatch. It was about 6-7 feet long and read: A lpo L ice I ncompetent C ooks E mployment S ervice Restaurant.

content: I don't know why people still shop at the PX. Even with tax savings, their prices are terrible. Wal-Mart > PX.
